attributes.title: Gwayne Corbray
attributes.image: Gwayne_Corbray.png'''Gwayne Corbray''' is an unseen character in ''Game of Thrones (TV series)

sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Ser Gwayne Corbray's actions are recorded in the [[White Book]]. During the Battle of the Redgrass Field, he fought in the vanguard of Lord [[Arryn]] and dueled Daemon Blackfyre bearing [[Lady Forlorn]], the [[Valyrian steel]] blade of [[House Corbray]], while Daemon bore [[Blackfyre]]. Daemon defeated Ser Gwayne after an hour, but in a demonstration of chivalry, had his supporter, a knight known as Redtusk, take Ser Gwayne to the Blackfyre rear to see to his wounds.
